scripts.triggerCucmberTests-tags-multiple-or: npx cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/features/agreements/search-agreements.feature --env TAGS='@caseVariations or @noSearchTerm' --headed --browser chrome
scripts.triggerCucmberTests-tags-multiple-and: npx cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/features/agreements/search-agreements.feature --env TAGS='@caseVariations and @noSearchTerm' --headed --browser chrome
scripts.triggerCucmberTests-tags-multiple-and-no: npx cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/features/agreements/search-agreements.feature --env TAGS='@caseVariations and  not  @noSearchTerm' --headed --browser chrome
scripts.generate-fresh-reports-use-run-not-open: npx cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/features/agreements/search-agreements.feature --env TAGS='@caseVariations or @noSearchTerm' --headed --browser chrome
